name: The Comic
description:
Sick of carrying your comic books? Why not wear them instead! This steel blue t-shirt has been hand drawn, scanned in and printed. The t-shirt tells a tale of a lone man in search of a missing lady.
100% Cotton • Twin needle stiching on collar, sleeves and hem • Taped neckline Our item comes in either SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE or X-LARGE (Small based on 36-38 Inch - Medium based on 38-40 inch - Large based on 40-42 inch - XL based on 42-44 inch)
Postage:

We offer international delivery on all our items including the UK, Europe, United States, Canada, New Zealand, Australia, Russia, Japan and more. We aim to despatch within three working days and items will be sent via Royal Mail 1st Class for UK orders or via Airmail for International orders. We do try to ensure P&P is at its minimum and as we are considerate of the environment we often try to re-use perfectly acceptable packaging. All items will be safe and secure and collected at our studio by Royal Mail.

name: Create Your Own Bespoke Button Badges
description:
Fancy designing your own badges? You can with our custom 25 mm / 1 inch button badges. Quotes, slogans, photos, logos or anything else you can think of! All our badges are made using high quality metal parts and pressed to perfection. Our badges come in a range of quantities so whether you've on the look out for... one badge, a set of 50, or a set of 5000 it all happens here at Northern Delight. What's the best bit about our badges you might be asking? Unlike other companies we don't restrict you to one or two designs on low quantities. So if you opt for a set of 10, 25, 50 or 100 badges you can have every badge different if you'd like. Not bad eh? After you've selected your chosen quantity from the drop down menu below and gone through the PayPal payment system simply send through your artwork or ideas to northerndelight@live.com We'll send you through a quick mock-visual of how your badge will look. If you're really stuck for ideas you can choose from the badge colours and font's shown in the images. We'll even throw in some free basic design work for your badges. This might include setting your words up, laying things out, adding little bits etc. For anything a bit more complicated, such as designing a logo, adding your friends face onto a monkeys body etc please contact us before ordering and we can discuss what needs to be done, and any extra charge which may be incurred. All designs require a 10 mm "bleed" around the 25 mm diamtre. This wraps around the edge of the badge. The bleed area is 35 mm diametre and we can gladly supply a template for this. The image below shows the back of the badges and the pin.
Postage:

We offer international delivery on all our items including the UK, Europe, United States, Canada, New Zealand, Australia, Japan, Russia and more. All sets of 10 and all individual badges will be despatched within three working days and items will be sent via Royal Mail 1st Class for UK orders or via Airmail for International orders. For orders of 50 badges and above despatch times start at 5 working days. If you do have a question about delivery dates please get in touch at northerndelight@live.com and we'll do all all we can to get your badges to you as quick as possible. We do try to ensure P&P is at its minimum and as we are considerate of the environment we often try to re-use perfectly acceptable packaging. All items will be safe and secure and collected at our studio by Royal Mail.

name: Recycled Tea Sack Messenger Bags
description:
These super-trendy messenger bags come from the Rag-Bag range and are made from recycled tea sacks collected by rag pickers in India at tea factories, restaurants and hotels. The image here shows one of the bags but as they are all made from different tea sacks it does of course mean each bag is unique in it's own way. There are some bags with more print and some with less but either way they are sure to be the envy of others. This strong and waterproof material are washed, cut in patterns and sewn into new trendy bags. This messenger bag has a zippered main compartment, zippered front pocket under flap with inside pocket to store your small stuff. Adjustable shoulder strap. 80 GSM Non woven polypropylene. Measurments - 35 x 30 x 8 cm Producer - Adithya Trade Design - Vera Winthagen Postage:

We offer international delivery on all our items including the UK, Europe, United States, Canada, New Zealand, Australia, Japan and more. We aim to despatch within three working days and items will be sent via Royal Mail 2nd Class for UK orders or via Airmail for International orders. We do try to ensure P&P is at its minimum and as we are considerate of the environment we often try to re-use perfectly acceptable packaging. All items will be safe and secure and collected at our studio by Royal Mail.
